Najah::

"definitibly... "replied Najah annoyed and he felt more hunger " You 
sssshould have taken a parrot asss beasst mode... Cause I didn't know 
other bird that open itsss peak to ssay nossssenses... And if you 
don't zip your peak your sssituation could became pretty 
ssssqueeezed..."

And while Naajah was saying this  he started pressed at Lady Hawk.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk looks upon Repressor with an angry stare. "I prefer to 
move on my
> own wings thank you." It was bad enough that a former member of 
royalty was
> demoted to a peeon scientist, now she was being treated like a 
common
> criminal.
> 
> "A hawk...." replied Najah at Ldy Hawk mimic an amazing tone "Do you
> really though that you're a parrot... anyway a parrot would be a
> greaat beast mode to you"
> 
> Lady Hawk thought for a moment, A parrot would be a great beast 
mode. Just
> not for her.  Now she wasn't getting any respect at all. it was bad 
enough
> to be treated as a criminal, now she was being mocked by a belly 
crawler.
> "Look you low level, belly crawling sand sucking overgrown worm It 
is
> advisable to treat me with a little more respect or you will end up 
dinner
> for a carnivore." She'd take crap from Zardus but not from a 
reptile like
> Najah.
